ai_description: This piece of paper was mercilessly ripped from a perfectly innocent book. Anybody who thinks to mutilate books in such a manner is obviously a terrible person. It appears to be an extract of a cleric’s journal, one side half a terrible love poem for his aunt, the other something about ghosts.
description: This piece of paper was mercilessly ripped from a perfectly innocent book. It's torn away from its home and irreparably harmed. It appears to be an extract of a cleric’s journal, with half a terrible love poem for his aunt and something about ghosts.
name: Torn Book Page
